meta.article_title: April 16, 2012 - Where to Place Your Spin Serves

spin_serve_placement.probleme: Where to place spin serves for effectiveness

debutant.probleme: Spin away from opponent harder to receive
debutant.solution: Serve to wide backhand, break spin away

debutant.probleme: Spin into opponent easier to receive
debutant.solution: Serve to forehand, break spin into receiver

exercices_complementaires.description: Visualize aiming left (normal) for counter-spin; for backhand or tomahawk, aim right (down the line)

metriques_progression: Vary spin serves to all parts of table; experiment with different placements

erreurs_a_eviter.probleme: Lowering racket when moving for serve
